name: Resource Division
description: Two agents must divide a set of items. Each agent has different preferences and values for each item.

public_info.rule: Items must be divided fairly. Both agents should get at least 2 items.

agent_a_secrets.strategy: Really wants the Laptop and Monitor. Headphones and Keyboard are less important.

agent_b_secrets.strategy: Really wants the Headphones and Keyboard. Laptop is nice but not essential.

agreement_criteria.success_condition: Both agents agree on item allocation where each gets at least 2 items
agreement_criteria.failure_condition: No agreement reached or one agent gets fewer than 2 items
